preconditions.precondition: A user wants to remove a comment.

mainSequence.step: TEST requests to remove a comment identified by signId and commentId.
System validates the member with the provided signId.
System validates the comment identified by commentId.
System checks if the user is the writer of the comment using signId and commentId.
System removes the comment identified by commentId.
System sends a response to TEST, indicating that the comment has been successfully removed.
